name: Lighthouse Beach
description: A expansive beach near Chatham Lighthouse, known for its beautiful views and strong currents. Popular for walking and seal watching.

name: Harding's Beach
description: A family-friendly beach with calm waters, perfect for swimming and kayaking. Features amenities like parking and restrooms.

name: Ridgevale Beach
description: A picturesque beach with warm, shallow waters, ideal for families with young children. Great for windsurfing and kayaking.

name: Cockle Cove Beach
description: A quieter beach with a mix of sandy and rocky areas. Popular for beachcombing and enjoying serene views of Nantucket Sound.

name: Hardings Beach
description: A long, sandy beach with gentle waves, perfect for swimming and sunbathing. Offers beautiful sunset views over Nantucket Sound.

name: Forest Beach
description: A small, secluded beach surrounded by natural beauty. Ideal for those seeking a peaceful retreat and nature observation.

name: Pleasant Street Beach
description: A charming neighborhood beach with calm waters, perfect for a quiet day by the sea. Limited parking makes it a local favorite.
